content: 7-1/2 from the heel turn approximately 65 rounds toe if using cc for toe change to cc now round 1 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1* repeat between * for back needle rounds 2-4 knit round 5 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1* repeat between * for back needle rounds 6-7 knit round 8 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1* repeat between * for back needle round 9 knit rounds 10-16 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1* repeat between * for back needle for 72 st sock break yarn and close toe using kitchener stitch for 60 64 st socks rounds 17-18 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1* repeat between * for back needle break yarn and close toe using kitchener stitch kitchener stitch front needle 1 insert your tapestry needle into the first stitch as if to k and slide it off the needle 2 insert your tapestry needle into the next stitch as if to p and leave it on the needle back needle 3 insert your tapestry needle into the first stitch as if to p and slide it off the needle 4 insert your tapestry needle into the next stitch as if to k and leave it on the needle repeat steps 1 through 4 until 2 sts remain insert your tapestry needle into the front st as if to k and slide off the needle then into the back st as if to p and slide off the needle you might consider saying knit off purl purl off knit as you go to help you remember the order weave in your ends wash and block © crazypennygirl designs for personal use only questions email beth at crazypennygirl@hotmail com page 3
